author: Timothy Linward
description:
The DnD Rogue presents a wealth of different play options, allowing you to be a dashing thief in one game, a grim assassin in the next, and then a spirit medium or swashbuckling pirate. With the Rogue 5e class, you have your pick of spells, skills, and sneaky attacks - and any party will be glad to have you. This guide is a deep dive into the shadows, giving you everything you need to form your Dungeons and Dragons Rogue.

Continue reading DnD Rogue 5e class guide
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: DnD Rogue 5e class guide

author: Timothy Linward
description:
We’re just a couple of weeks away from UK Games Expo 2025, the biggest event of the year for the UK board games scene, and one of the largest in the world. Team Wargamer is travelling there in force this year, and as part of our preparation we’ve drawn up a long list of board games we can’t wait to try out - and we thought we’d share the five we’re most excited about.

Continue reading Five new board games we're stoked to play at UK Games Expo 2025
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games , Couples' board games, Board games for adults
title: Five new board games we're stoked to play at UK Games Expo 2025

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Owlcat Games has revealed Warhammer 40k: Dark Heresy, a new CRPG set in the grim darkness of the far future. This is an adaptation of a much beloved tabletop RPG, which sees bands of unfortunate acolytes root out cults, corruption, aliens, heretics, mutants, and daemons, in the service of an all powerful Inquisitor.

Continue reading Legendary Warhammer 40k RPG Dark Heresy is getting an Owlcat videogame
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games, All Warhammer 40k factions
title: Legendary Warhammer 40k RPG Dark Heresy is getting an Owlcat videogame

author: Matt Bassil
description:
A decades old Magic: The Gathering card is spiking in price thanks to its inclusion in a hot new Modern deck. Coldsnap copies of Allosaurus Rider were selling for $1.70 a couple of days ago, but now they’re being snapped up for a whopping $16.20. A surge of interest in a 19-year-old card with very low supply is a perfect recipe for this sort of sudden jump. Other versions of the card haven’t moved at all, but the Coldsnap variant is soaring.

Continue reading Ancient MTG card that powers a nasty Modern combo spikes 850%
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: Ancient MTG card that powers a nasty Modern combo spikes 850%

author: Alex Evans
description:
It's that time again! Skulls 2025 drops today, with a cavalcade of reveals and teasers for the next crop of Warhammer videogames - and we're celebrating by giving away free Steam keys for Warhammer 40k Space Marine 2, the best 40k shooter ever made. Thanks to our friends at Focus Entertainment, we've got three copies of the $100 Ultra Edition to raffle off - each rolling in the Season Pass and cosmetic extras - and all you've got to do to be in with a chance of winning one is join our cool new Discord server!

Continue reading Grab your chance for a free PC copy of Space Marine 2 Ultra Edition, worth $100
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games,
title: Grab your chance for a free PC copy of Space Marine 2 Ultra Edition, worth $100

author: Matt Bassil
description:
Pokémon Pocket has announced its next expansion, coming up in a week’s time. As suspected, Extradimensional Crisis is themed around the Ultra Beasts, the extradimensional Pokémon that appeared in the Sun and Moon games, and it’s releasing on May 29, 2025.

Continue reading New Pokémon Pocket set coming May 29, with a truly evil Guzzlord ex
MORE FROM WARGAMER: How many Pokémon are there?, How to play Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards
title: New Pokémon Pocket set coming May 29, with a truly evil Guzzlord ex

author: Timothy Linward
description:
If you’re still riding high from Star Wars: Andor’s second season, you might want to relive some of the tense shootouts and nail-biting battles on the tabletop. Here’s what you need to know to get started with Star Wars: Shatterpoint, a miniature wargame that puts the focus on epic duels between the most famous heroes and villains from throughout the Star Wars timeline.

Continue reading If you loved Andor, here's how to get into Star Wars: Shatterpoint
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Star Wars Shatterpoint review, The best Star Wars board games, Star Wars Legion expansions guide
title: If you loved Andor, here's how to get into Star Wars: Shatterpoint

author: Callum Self
description:
If you’ve been looking for a great deal and a chance to grab some more cards for your collection, this Pokémon Paradox Wisdom discount is a happy surprise. Why is it a surprise? Well, the hype has got every trainer catching 'em all, making it hard to get some packs at a decent price, and this UK-only discount bundle not only gives you seven packs from various expansions, but packs in a nice set of promos too.

Continue reading Get seven of the greatest Pokémon TCG packs in one UK discount bundle
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards, All Pokémon sets in order
title: Get seven of the greatest Pokémon TCG packs in one UK discount bundle

author: Mollie Russell
description:
A Dungeons and Dragons fan has taken on the behemoth task of building a 3D-printed Castle Ravenloft, which stands over seven feet tall. The files for recreating the iconic Curse of Strahd castle first appeared late last year, but due to its size, building it would remain a pipe dream for most. Czech D&D podcasters Bez Zástěny, however, said “challenge accepted”, and posted a build video to social media on May 21.

Continue reading Holy crap, a DnD fan actually built the 7-foot model of Castle Ravenloft
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: Holy crap, a DnD fan actually built the 7-foot model of Castle Ravenloft
